public int getSize()
返回：

createIndex

public abstract void createIndex()

createIndex

protected void createIndex(java.lang.Comparable s)
This method will compare the element and append them

参数：
s - the element to be appended into the table

toFile

public abstract void toFile(java.lang.String indexDir)

toFile

protected void toFile(java.lang.String indexDir,
                      java.lang.String fileName,
                      java.lang.String content)
This method will keep the index into a file

参数：
indexDir - the path to save the index
fileName - the index file`s name
content - the content to be kept into the index file
